sections.description: Pizazz SliderPlus provides a straightforward slider for WP content and for Headway users, a header block with sliding images
sections.installation:
For new users, downlaod the zip and install via WP plugins.

For existing users, click install

For manual upgrade, download the zip, delete the existing SliderPlus in WP Admin Plugins, and then install the new one
